scripts.preinstall: node -e "const ua=process.env.npm_config_user_agent||''; if(!ua.includes('pnpm')){console.error('This repo requires pnpm. Install with: corepack enable && corepack prepare pnpm@latest --activate'); process.exit(1)}"
scripts.dev: concurrently "pnpm --filter be run start:dev" "pnpm --filter fe run dev"
scripts.build: pnpm --filter be run build && pnpm --filter fe run build
scripts.test: pnpm --filter be run test && pnpm --filter fe run test
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter be run lint && pnpm --filter fe run lint
scripts.lint:fix: pnpm --filter be run lint:fix && pnpm --filter fe run lint:fix
scripts.format: pnpm --filter be run format && pnpm --filter fe run format
scripts.format:write: pnpm --filter be run format:write && pnpm --filter fe run format:write
scripts.clean: pnpm --filter be run clean 2>/dev/null || true && pnpm --filter fe run clean 2>/dev/null || true
